item.description:
At the last meeting everyone received a copy of the short book Walls In Our Minds by MJ Red Beckman. If you weren't there to get your copy PLEASE come to this meeting anyway and join the discussion.

We will discuss this book and how it relates to The Constitution.

If you have a pocket Constitution please bring it too. (You might need if for cross reference!)

ALL ARE WELCOME!!!
Please come and bring a friend.

group.name: FREEDOM IS FUNDAMENTAL Book Club and Discussion Group

item.name: WALLS IN OUR MIND
